hero.title: Dandeli Elephant Safari & Adventure Day Trip
hero.subtitle: Experience wildlife encounters and thrilling water adventures in the lush landscapes of Dandeli

cta.headline: Ready for Your Dandeli Adventure?
cta.description: Book now and secure your spot for an unforgettable day of wildlife encounters and thrilling activities

whatsapp.message: Hi! I'm interested in your Dandeli Elephant Safari tour package. Please send me details.

itinerary.title: Departure from Your Location
itinerary.description: Begin your journey early to make the most of your day

itinerary.title: Arrival in Dandeli
itinerary.description: Reach the Dandeli region, known for its lush landscapes and thrilling adventures

itinerary.title: Dandeli Water Adventures
itinerary.description: White water rafting, kayaking, natural jacuzzi, and optional ziplining

itinerary.title: Lunch Break
itinerary.description: Traditional North Karnataka or local cuisine at a nearby resort or local restaurant

itinerary.title: Elephant Safari
itinerary.description: Peaceful ride on trained elephants through the sanctuary, observing wildlife and scenic surroundings

itinerary.title: Jeep Safari
itinerary.description: Venture deeper into the jungle to spot bison, deer, and exotic birds

itinerary.title: Nature Exploration
itinerary.description: Experience the lush greenery and serene ambiance of Dandeli's forests

itinerary.title: Departure from Dandeli
itinerary.description: Start your return journey, reflecting on the day's adventures

itinerary.title: Arrival Back at Your Location
itinerary.description: Conclude the day with cherished memories and stories

inclusions.title: Private Transport
inclusions.description: AC Innova Crysta with experienced driver for the entire day

inclusions.title: Lunch
inclusions.description: Delicious lunch at a local restaurant or resort

inclusions.title: Activity Fees
inclusions.description: Elephant safari, jeep safari, and water activities included

inclusions.title: Toll Tax
inclusions.description: All highway and road tolls covered

inclusions.title: Photo Stops
inclusions.description: Plenty of time for photos at scenic locations

footer.description: Weaving your dreams into unforgettable adventures since 2010.
